net.hudup.core.data.ctx

Interface ContextTemplateSchema

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Transfer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContextTemplateSchemaImpl

    public interface ContextTemplateSchema
extends java.io.Serializable, Transfer
    ContextTemplateSchema class represents a scheme of context templates. By default, it includes a set of root templates; each root template is a tree or a set, which in turn, have many templates Note, ContextTemplate is template for a context represented by the class Context. Context includes time, location, companion, etc. associated with a user when she/he is buying, studying, etc. For example, Time is the template for time context 31/10/2015 6:45. In other words, context is an instance of context template with specific value. A set of context templates is structured as the model which is called context template schema represented by this interface. Please see Context and ContextTemplate for more details of context and context template. Context template schema is managed by context template schema manager, called shortly CTS manager.
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen

    • Method Detail

      • getTemplateById

        ContextTemplate getTemplateById(int templateId)
        Getting context template via specified template ID.
        Parameters:
        templateId - specified context template identification (ID)
        Returns:
        context template having specified ID.

      • getRoot

        ContextTemplate getRoot(int index)
        Every schema has a list of root context templates. This method returns a root template at specified index.
        Parameters:
        index - specified index.
        Returns:
        root context template at specified index.

      • getRootById

        ContextTemplate getRootById(int rootId)
        Retrieving a root template via its identification (ID).
        Parameters:
        rootId - specified root template ID.
        Returns:
        root template having specified ID.

      • indexOfRoot

        int indexOfRoot(int rootId)
        Every schema has a list of root context templates. Each root template has always an identification (ID). This method looks up index of the root template specified by given ID.
        Parameters:
        rootId - specified root template ID.
        Returns:
        index of the root template specified by given ID.

      • addRoot

        boolean addRoot(ContextTemplate root)
        Every schema has a list of root context templates. Such list can be expended by adding a specified new root template via calling this method.
        Parameters:
        root - specified new root template.
        Returns:
        whether add successfully

      • removeRootById

        ContextTemplate removeRootById(int rootId)
        Every schema has a list of root context templates. Such list can be shrunk by removing a root template having specified ID via calling this method. Moreover this method also returns the root template having just removed from the list.
        Parameters:
        rootId - specified root template identification (ID).
        Returns:
        the removed root template.

      • rootSize

        int rootSize()
        Every schema has a list of root context templates. This method returns the size of such list.
        Returns:
        size of the list of root context templates.

      • defaultTemplate

        ContextTemplate defaultTemplate()
        Creating the default template. For different implementation of ContextTemplateSchema, this method is defined differently. For example, in hierarchical schema, the default template also has hierarchical structure.
        Returns:
        default ContextTemplate

      • defaultCTSchema

        void defaultCTSchema()
        After constructing, schema is empty, which have no templates. The implementation of this interface is responsible for defining this method in order to initialize itself with some default templates. For example, a class that implements this interface can create the template structure weekdays {Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday} in this method.

      • getAllTemplates

        ContextTemplate[] getAllTemplates()
        Retrieving all templates in schema.
        Returns:
        array of all templates in schema.

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clearing this schema, which means that removing all root templates from this schema.
